item.title: LIFE+ ENSAT (CAT) / Enhancement of Soil Aquifer Treatment
item.description: https://youtu.be/bMjzetuLu_0 Cetaqua Published on Nov 7, 2012 SUBSCRIBE 34 SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE The ENSAT Life+ project aims at enhancing and optimizing this technology, progressing from laboratory studies to a pilot field scale study (located at the recharge site of Sant Vicen√ß dels Horts, Barcelona). Results obtained and lessons learned will be able to be implemented to transfer sites in Europe to improve the operation of the trial and full scale Aquifer Recharge plants.
